foreignData.name: Nektartopf aus Kazandu
foreignData.text: Landung — Immer wenn ein Land unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, erhältst du 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.

foreignData.name: Nectalera de Kazandu
foreignData.text: Aterrizaje — Siempre que una tierra entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, ganas 1 vida.

foreignData.name: Fourmi pot-de-nectar du Kazandou
foreignData.text: Toucheterre — À chaque fois qu'un terrain arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, vous gagnez 1 point de vie.

foreignData.name: Nettarifero di Kazandu
foreignData.text: Terraferma — Ogniqualvolta una terra entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, guadagni 1 punto vita.

foreignData.name: カザンドゥの蜜壺虫
foreignData.text: 上陸 ― 土地が１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、あなたは１点のライフを得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 昆虫

foreignData.name: 카잔두 꿀물단지벌레
foreignData.text: 대지력 — 대지가 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다.

foreignData.name: Nectarino de Kazandu
foreignData.text: Aterragem — Toda vez que um terreno entra no campo de batalha sob seu controle, você ganha 1 ponto de vida.

foreignData.name: Нектарник из Казанду
foreignData.text: Землепад — Каждый раз, когда земля выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, вы получаете 1 жизнь.

foreignData.name: 卡赞度琼浆虫
foreignData.text: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。

foreignData.name: 卡贊度瓊漿蟲
foreignData.text: 地落～每當一個地在你的操控下進戰場時，你獲得1點生命。

name: Kazandu Nectarpot
originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

rulings.text: A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.
A landfall ability doesn’t trigger if a permanent already on the battlefield becomes a land.

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
